New Records: Pakistan recorded the highest successful run chase of 10 wickets in T20 World Cup history
Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 16 runs, dismissing Rohit Sharma and KL Rahul early
Virat Kohli scored 57 runs, including a 53-run partnership with Rishabh Pant
Babar Azam scored an unbeaten 68 runs, while Mohammad Rizwan scored 78 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli accepted that Pakistan outplayed and outclassed India, giving them credit for finishing the game off in style
Babar Azam expressed pride in Pakistan's win and confidence to build on it
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan finally broke the World Cup shackles that India had placed them in, after 29 years
The game was decided in 19 balls, with Pakistan chasing down the target in just 19.5 overs
Others: The match was played in the T20 World Cup 2021, with Pakistan winning the match by 10 wickets
